User¶

A user a real-world person of the system (think: login/password). A user has represents one ore more owners. A user has automatically one “owner” assigned: Him/Herself. In addition to this, the user can have access to other owners. This is typically a group.

User Properties¶

id
internal unique ID
name
A simple string (i.e.: username, login-name, ...)
openid
A OpenID-Link
sechash
A security hash (i.e. password hash)
